summary_text:
Food is great, especially the price of a car wash. 

I'm a huge fan of the place and they have good prices, but it's not always a great experience. Clean and friendly staff

Place is clean and you can see the owner. I was going to take my daughter here for pedicures that day. Found out that it was on the same level as it was so cute and they had a good time. I love this place so much so I will be back for her next time we are in town

New Mexican food is great. I'm not a huge fan of the location but this is our go to spot. Staff was friendly and attentive. The chips are great and we got a free meal. They have a great happy hour (with a nice patio) to my surprise!

Another great place to hang out at.

Love the decor, friendly staff and cool atmosphere.  I'm not a fan of the drinks but I'm not sure what else is going on. It's a great place to relax and enjoy a great drink!

Solid Mexican food, very good. I had the chicken and waffles with rice and beans. It was just as good and the service was great!! They have a very nice staff that is very friendly and helpful. We will be back for sure!  I have no complaints about it and will be back again soon!

The best thing about this place is that it is a little more than a mile from the Strip. We've been there at least 5 times now, and it's always a bit of a wait. I'm not sure if it's the only time that it's not on the strip.  But it's a fun place to take a date, but it's just not a huge deal. Parking is also easy, though we had to park at the bar, but we will be back!

New location and I was in need of a new doctor. I was scheduled to have a long day in the heat of a new house. They were able to fit me in and make sure that my daughter was having a blast. His level of professionalism and expertise of the Doctors were awesome. 

Thank you so much for taking such great care of us!

The hotel is close to our house, so I was a little hesitant to go to a place that is cleaner. We played some slots and the place had a nice atmosphere. Service was good, food was good and prices were reasonable. I would say this place is a great place to go with a group of friends and family!

Go eat there for the first time. I had chicken shawarma, and it was amazing!

Very friendly staff, nice interior design of a place that is clean and well kept. The owner is a very nice guy.  Will be back.

The staff was very friendly and helpful. I was there to get my clothes fixed and the associate was there to help me out. It's a shame that this is the only place I will buy a suit from here in town. Also, they have a great staff that treats you like family! Thanks for being so helpful and friendly.

A vegan menu with a lot of choices on the menu and I'm a big fan of the chicken. Also, I have never had anything like this before. It's like eating an ice cream and they're so so good! The owner is a sweetheart and is so sweet, the owner is a real real character!

The food is great, beer is great and it was a good place to eat. They have a bar/restaurant and it's very close to my house. After being there for the last time we were in town for a week.  Good job, thank you guys

The place is not bad, I'm not sure if it's just a chain. I went with a friend and had to order a side of rice. The fish was so fresh and juicy.  It was very good and the service was friendly and attentive. I will be back for more food and drinks at the bar.

Showed up on time and was able to get a new home. They were able to move my house to the top of the ceiling and was able to fix it without any problems. There are no surprises after all of these types of men who are looking for a moving company that is very professional and fun. I would recommend anyone to do business with this company again, this is your place.  Thanks for your hard work!

Large pizza! I'm not a big pizza fan but this place is great. The pizza is made fresh to order and the crust is perfect. Creative menu and a great price for a great tasting pizza!

Also, they have a very good selection of beer, but it's not very busy for a Friday night so take advantage of the rest of the menu!

Good food and fast service. I was a little disappointed with the size of the gyro. I had to ask for no onions and they gave me a small amount of cheese. Love it! Not to mention, the owner was very nice and offered to help me get a free slice of cheese on a random pita.  Good job, thanks for a great time with my family!

A nice little restaurant in the heart of Yorkville. Service is good, but food is just ok.

Had the salmon and it was just ok... I think it's a bit more expensive than it should be.  The pasta was not as good as I expected and it's not a great addition to the menu

Will be back for more wine & beer!

New York style deli and a must-try. I'm a big fan of the sandwiches, but this place is the bomb. The food was delicious as well so I'll be back to try other things on the menu.  Can't wait to go back for more sandwiches.

I love the food here. Their fish is so fresh and the sauce was amazing!  The whole experience was great, the server was very attentive and fun to talk to. And I'm a big fan of the catfish. Very tender!   My bf had the catfish, it was great

The food is delicious and reasonably priced. We had a great time at this place, but I was not impressed. We ordered a few appetizers and a pizza and the pizza was cooked perfectly. It was a great experience overall, we will be back for sure! I'm always satisfied with the pizza & service!

3.5 hours later my wife and I were forced to go to the dealership. They were able to get me in for a week to get my car back.  He was friendly and knowledgeable and will make sure your vehicle is set up.  We had a group of 6 people in the market, and I had to wait a bit for the service and quality.  When we were there, he was in the shop, no one can help me.  That's why I would give this place 5 stars.

Place is a bit of a drive from my house but the food was delicious. We had the lamb vindaloo and a chicken tikka masala. It was delicious, but they have a gluten free menu that is really difficult to find and will be in the area again. Service was friendly and efficient - staff was friendly and attentive.

The food is amazing, I had the beef noodle soup. Not much flavor to it but I love it.  Their "Hot" was a bit too salty and not enough flavor with the noodles. But this was not my thing and it was a bit too salty for me. But overall it was a pleasant experience.
Ramen noodles are amazing! The ramen was delicious and the broth is very flavorful.  I'm a fan of their food, but it's definitely not too expensive. A little pricey but you get what you pay for.

Poor service. Went in for a spa day and the staff was friendly. The pool is very small and not that big, but it's not for children. It was an overall great experience and will be back again and again. Thank you for your great service and excellent hospitality

AMAZING macarons! Delicious, fresh and delicious. I've had the macaroons before and they were all very tasty. The chocolate cream cheese was a bit too sweet for me but it is just a treat for me.  It's a cute little place with a variety of different treats, but I think I'll stick to the chocolate chip cookies next time. I can't wait to try more items on the menu

A wonderful experience at this wonderful hotel. We had a couple of the best experience and I was able to get it all together for the day.  We had a great experience and the staff was friendly and helpful, they're accommodating and generous with his customers. I highly recommend it for anyone who wants to see a safety party, or just to get around to a great time!

The sushi chef is amazing. I would recommend this place to anyone, and the food is great and so is the service. I had a great meal with a friend to get it for her birthday. We were there for a private party - and he was very busy, but it was a good experience.  Really enjoyed our meal here, but the service was great. I'm sure we'll be back for sure! Thanks for making my last experience very enjoyable.

Simply the best food in town.  I had a medium rare and it was delicious.  Very fresh and tasty.  The service was prompt, attentive, and the servers were friendly. Service was slow but friendly.

Service was good but only one server was a bit flustered. My friend was not allowed to use his card and the host did not pay attention to us as the server was a bit slow.

Large portions, tasty burgers. I could eat this everyday but this is the only place to get a late night snack. Come early and order the same thing. The fries are crispy and delicious, but it's a little pricy but worth it!

The chicken sandwich was delicious, and the meat is tender. I was surprised how good it was when it was served in a styrofoam box. I'm sure it will be a good place to go to the other places in the valley and have a good meal. Not a bad place to take your family, but not a place to go for a good meal.  If you want real food go to this place.

New place to be in Chinatown. The food is good and the portions are big, I got a medium rare for 2 people. Beef and Broccoli beef were great.  Chicken was tender and juicy with a nice crisp texture. And I'm not a fan of their soup.

The service is great. We came here with the family for lunch and it was great. Food was great, I would recommend trying this place out. They have a salsa bar with a good variety of salsas and salsa. Only one complaint is that the chips are not fresh and the server was very friendly :)

Fun atmosphere and great food. I would say it's a great place to get a bite to eat with the kids. The service was great, our server was very attentive. If you are looking for a great place for a nice night out with friends, this is the place to go. Service was great and we will be back.
Solid place to eat in the downtown area. The owner is very nice and very personable. Food is great and I would recommend this place to anyone, and we'll be back for sure!

Sunday morning at the Venetian is my go to place when I'm craving some chocolate covered espresso.  So much better than any other place I've ever been to, and it's the best part about this place. Good coffee, good taste and super friendly staff. It's a little pricey for the amount but it's worth it.  The macaroons are great too and they are very generous too.

Everything about this place is amazing. The staff is so friendly and helpful, I'm a huge fan of the city for the day. However, it's not a big deal, it's a fun place to go to, but I'm not sure that i will be going back to have it again. 

Also, we live in Phoenix so we are visiting from out of town and have never been here before. Great views, you won't regret it. Highly recommended!!
The food was great and so was service. I had a great server named Joey and we had a great time. Food is great, wine selection is great and the atmosphere is great!

The owner was very friendly and helpful. I had a great experience with them, I was very pleased with my experience. Everyone was very friendly and helpful and prices are reasonable for the price they charge.

Fresh food, great atmosphere. The place is very clean and well kept. We had the steak tacos, it was very good, big portion. I had the carne asada burrito with pork and beans. It was good but the beans and rice were a bit dry but not too bad either.  I'm sure it's a bit pricey but it's still worth it for me. 

I hope this place stays in business for a long time

A friend and I were visiting from out of town and wanted to check out the new restaurant. They have a great happy hour menu. We had the burrito, street tacos and a few drinks. Chicken was delicious but the green beans were amazing!! Service was excellent as well as he was there to serve us he was so sweet and made our experience great

Really cool place to hang out with friends. The bar is open until midnight and the outside patio is a little scary. But it was a great experience! My wife and I had a slice of pizza, which was a great choice.  Service was great as well. Will be back for sure!
Service was great and the food was delicious. I'm a fan of the goat cheese appetizer, which is a nice twist on a plate of eggs, bacon and sausage. I would go back for a cocktail or dessert!

My favorite place to eat. I'm not a big fan of the food, but it's hard to give it a 5 star. Only one thing to do is that they have a lot of options for the salad and it is a bit dry. But it was good and worth the wait. I'm not a fan of the ranch dressing but if I was in the area again I'll be back

Mihai is my favorite salon! She was so fast and friendly. I had a great experience here with the color, cut and style. I have never had a bad experience but this is the best hair dresser I've ever had. She's the only one that knows how to tell me about the cut and color. I'm so glad I did!

Definitely a great hair cut! Thanks for being so nice & friendly

New place with a few different places to eat. The ramen was good but I had the shrimp and egg roll which was pretty good. Service was good but not really understanding what kind of restaurant they had to offer. Not sure if I'll be back for a second time but the food is good and service is good

Our server was amazing! I had the buffet and it was a great experience.  My friend's time here was a bust.  It was a great experience and the staff is very attentive.  And the buffet is a great little snack.

Love that they have live music, so that is a good sign.

Holy moly, I love the French toast with the homemade sausage. We had their "secret" menu and it was amazing. The service was excellent and friendly and attentive.  A great place for a date or to enjoy a conversation with friends. Nice atmosphere, good food, great atmosphere!

Wonderful sushi place that is not the cheapest but it is a great place to go. The staff was friendly and attentive. The restaurant was clean and comfortable.  I had the scallops, which were delicious, I'm still craving some New England shrimp but I'm not sure if it's a "go to" place

the sushi is fresh and delicious. I'm not a big fan of raw fish, but this place is delicious! and they have a great selection of rolls, too.

Only complaint was the service was slow and the place is very small. I'm not sure if I will ever go back.

3.5/5. I was in a hurry and this place has great food, but it's the only place I will eat breakfast. Staff is always friendly, go check it out for sure. They also have a very large menu but it can get crowded at lunch time but it was worth the wait

Everything about my experience is exceptional. From the moment I walked in the door to buying a car, it was a pleasure to talk to him. Very professional and knowledgeable. We just went to their dealership and they were able to help us with our trade in and to find a new car for us. It's a great experience to do business with him for the help.

Just ok. I've been here twice and both times the employees were pretty nice but they don't care about the customer. They are always on point, but we've had a bad experience but I'm still happy with this location. Thanks Starbucks

An awesome ramen place. The ramen is pretty good, but not the best I've ever had. Service was friendly and fast. 

Service was a little slow, but the food was good. Will be back to try their other dishes and try some of their other menu items.

I wish I had gone to a tattoo parlor! This place was amazing and the owner was very friendly. I got a tattoo from here on the road. Very clean, friendly and professional staff.  They also have a great selection of polish, which was fun and entertaining. If I lived closer I would be back for more.

My GF and I tried this place out for the first time today. They messed up my order twice, it's a big deal. The food is always good but it's not the best it is in a hurry, service was slow and it took forever to get our order. Was not a fan of their sandwiches. Service was good and fast but not friendly!

The best part about this place is that there are a lot of people in there.  I was a little worried about the remodel, but we were able to get a good deal. Good selection of books, and I'm not sure how it is in a hurry to get a new bike to go. Great place to go to.

Service is exceptional. The food is delicious and the service was great!! I had a chimichanga and it was wonderful. We had a chicken enchilada and a beef taco, two of us and 2 small children. Food was just as good. Thanks for a great night

Ordered a couple of dishes from here and it was really good. The food is really good, I love the spicy sauce. We had a beef combo with chicken and it was good but not much to choose from. My daughter loved the teriyaki chicken, it was very good and not expensive.

The food is good, not bad at all. I had to order a #1 and it was not my style but at this place it was delicious. I'm not a big fan of pho but the broth was great & not greasy at all. 

I love the fact that they have a drive thru so you can take your own to go order if you want to eat cold noodles and a drink at the end of the meal

Food is top notch. I had the salmon and steak with a side of edamame. Everything was great, especially the steak with a side of nuts. The staff was friendly and helpful.

This place has amazing food and I love it!  It will be a long time to come back to this place

Food is pretty good. The staff was friendly and helpful but I'm not sure if that's what we paid for but he was able to get it right away.  Good food, good prices for a good amount of food just as good as the other locations.

Quiet and intimate. I was in town for a week. The staff is so friendly and helpful! It is so relaxing, it was a great experience and the best massage I have ever had. Thank you for making my day memorable.

I wish I was more than a little hesitant to try it out but it was a little disappointing. The cupcakes are good, the only thing that was good was the vanilla bean.  A little too salty for me.  If you want to try something new, this is not a place you'll be going to for a long time, but not here.

Fresh food. I would recommend this place to anyone who wants a great meal and a great time to celebrate a birthday. The calamari was delicious, but the bread was a bit stale. Very nice gesture, we will go back

New place to get a boba tea, but I'm not sure if they're making it. But I'm addicted to the boba tea and the milk tea with lychee jelly. Their new location is very clean and staff is friendly. I'm glad that we have a new location in the area that has a lot of different options to choose from (which is a plus) but it's definitely worth the drive and will be in a heartbeat again soon!

WORK, I called them last minute to get my windshield fixed. I had a new car and was not disappointed. The guys were very professional and courteous.  He was very knowledgeable about the work and told me it was a great deal to have done in a timely manner.  He was very helpful in explaining how to work with my car and I will definitely be calling him again when we need a new windshield installed in need of a new car :)

Ate here at night.  I had the lobster bisque, and it was great. The restaurant is a bit small, but it was a good place to eat.  I had a filet with crab and potato salad, both were excellent. Service was a bit slow but we did not see a lot of people in the restaurant, but we did have a good time with a couple of friends.  If you're looking for a great place to go to eat, this is the place to go.

New favorite place to eat. The food is very fresh and tasty, the restaurant is clean and bright. It's a little more expensive than most places (and the owner) is the nicest, and most welcoming owner. We had a wonderful experience and will be back! Loved it, as well as a great lunch menu.  My husband had the chicken shawarma sandwich and he said it was amazing. I will be back for more.  Also, make sure to bring cash as if they do.

These donuts are amazing! The donuts are fresh and delicious. I was so impressed with their selection of flavors, I'm sure that would be good, but I enjoyed the "coffee" drink. All in all, it was a good experience and we will be back. It was good to see a place in the area that will be open for a long time.

Always a great experience. The beer selection is good and the beer was good. My wife got a great time with my friends from out of town and I was very impressed by the staff. They were all nice to be there - he's a good guy to boot! Very friendly staff, good food.

Everyone was so nice and helpful. I love the fact that they have a wide range of people working there! Thank you for making this my first stop for all of my body needs. And they have a new building that is so nice to see, thanks for the great experience

The food was amazing! I got the shrimp and scallops, and it was great.

It's a great place to go with some friends and family. Crab cakes are awesome but I'm not sure if they could have a better term of a new chef or not. Server was friendly and helpful.  I'm coming back for sure.

Super fast service! I called in to have my iPhone 6s screen replaced and they replaced it with a nice new battery. He was very friendly and helpful.  Very clean, very professional and the prices are reasonable for the service.

The food was very good, and I've had better. I had a few choices from this place. They have a very good atmosphere and the staff is friendly. Menu is extensive and it's a good place to go with a group of friends. My girlfriend had a chicken breast with it.  He said it was just okay.

A friend recommended me to come here for a snack before my flight home. I was pleasantly surprised to find it here in the middle of the city (it's a small space with lots of seating and a small dining area with a lot of tables in the back. But it's all good, but it's a bit pricey for what you get, but it is a great place to go for a nice date or a snack after a long day at work

These guys are great. Went in for a late lunch and the food was so good, I wanted to try something new. Now I know what they are doing, but it was so much better than the last time we had it. Will be back for sure.

For a quick and easy meal this is the place. I had a large party of 6 and they were able to accommodate us with our food allergies.  My pork bone soup was tasty, but not much to choose from. Service was good, but not friendly.  Only complaint is that I was a little disappointed with the food and service because it's not very busy. But if you are in a rush you should come here.

My favorite sushi place in the area. Their lunch specials are great quality, and the price is reasonable. You can get a lot of food for a good price. Not much to say other than that it's a great place to eat and have a few drinks.

Oh my goodness. The coffee is great (it's a local place with a nice selection of coffee/tea, and a little bit of everything else at a fraction of the cost of Starbucks - I'm not sure what happened to this place but I'm glad I did. Nice to see a coffee shop open in a busy area.

Our first time here, not much for dinner. I was very impressed with the quality of their steaks and the service.  The wine list is extensive and not too expensive. Service was good too.  Service was great, I didn't have a reservation but they were accommodating and professional. Thanks for a great dinner.
Loved the pizza here. I had a veggie pizza with a side of mushrooms, cheese and a little bit of everything. The crust was perfectly crisp and fresh, also had a nice variety of toppings. Will be back

I wish the place was bigger. We finally had a chance to try this place out, and it was amazing. The bartender was attentive and nice to talk to. My server was excellent and attentive to the guests...next time I'm in town, will go back to try it out for a second night out!

Food is amazing! I had the lobster ravioli and it was great. We had the "lamb" with a side of pasta, it was a great choice for a special occasion. Lots of choices for wine/beer, food was good.

Stop by for a quick bite to eat.

The customer service was terrible and the donuts were not good. I'm not sure if I'm having a bad day or not but I'm not going to lie I'm not sure if it's because it was late at night but I'm still not sure about it. Coffee was good, but not my cup of coffee. Thanks for everything

Used to be a new favorite place to eat. The atmosphere is very nice and the food was great! Service was good and very attentive. My friend had a pasta dish and he said it was excellent. It was very flavorful, not too oily or too salty. I will be back to try some of their other menu items!
The lash lounge is amazing! I got a great deal on my eyelash extensions and I'm in love with it.  It was a pleasure to meet with her for a good price and great service!

The food was great and the service was good. My friend said he was not that busy and I'm not sure if it was a problem or not but he said they don't have to do it but I'm still waiting for it to be corrected! Good job

After reading the reviews I was excited to try this place. First time here and it was a good experience. The seating is limited, but it's still pretty much a bar. Service is not as good as the one on flamingo. I was told that they could have a drink place with a fire place on TV which is a plus that I know that is a real tourist trap. Service was slow, we had to ask for water and my check was about 20 minutes before closing time. Not a good experience!

The place is a little out of town. I came in on a Monday night and it was a blast! The server was nice and attentive. I've never seen a restaurant that has been in this location since June, but we're still going back to this location.  Food is good, service was good and the atmosphere is very nice.

The food was very good and not too expensive. I had a craving for some of the best tofu soup, but it's not my favorite. Very fresh and delicious. I would have given it 5 stars but it was very busy and there was no line. They have a great selection of flavors, but it needs to be more consistent.

Good service. I would say that the food is a bit pricey, but it was good! Very quick service and they have a wide selection of sushi and sashimi. Not much to say about the place.

Service was good, but not the best.

Easily one of the best sandwiches I've had in a long time. I had the turkey and swiss, everything was super fresh and tasty. They have a great selection of veggies & meat. It's usually a little pricey but it was worth the wait because it's not too far from the strip.

Fun place for kids to play with friends. The staff is friendly, clean and fun. Great location for groups.  I went there for a birthday party and it was a great experience.

Service was great. It was our first time there and I would recommend it to anyone.  Thanks for the great experience

I wish I could give a better review. I have been here twice now and both times have been great experiences with this salon. The owner is so nice and patient with me, I got a beautiful lash extensions and a new lash extensions.. It's always been a pleasure to have them painted me a new lash spot. They did a great job, will be back when I need a fill they are so much better than any other place I've ever been to!

They took me in for a walk-in appointment with my sister in law. He was so kind and helpful. Very professional and kind, the owner was so sweet and funny. I got a tattoo from him and I'm so happy that I found this place! Definitely will be coming back here again for the next day. Thank you guys for everything

Like most of the reviews here. I had to order a salad and they were out of something. Food was not fresh, but a little overpriced for what we got.  Not sure if this place is going to be a while or not but the quality of the food.

Food is amazing! I'm not a big fan of lamb, but the lamb and chicken kabobs were delicious. Friendly staff.

The staff is very friendly. You won't be disappointed.

I wish the bar was better than it was in the old location. But, there is a real bar and it's not too loud. Food was good, service was great and food was good. I will be back for the wings, they are a must try.

My first time here, the sushi was good. The salmon was a little overcooked and not enough heat to make it taste like it should be cooked in a microwave.  All in all, it was a very good experience and will return again.
